column4: Does anyone know how to fix X server or whatever its called?  I just installed, and can't open a gui and can only do command line.  I need to download the Nvidia drivers or something to fix it cause thats what I did last time, but I can't remember how
this should get you a functional gui
open a terminal and type "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" choose teh VESA driver
its not a nvidia driver, but it should get you a gui
